column1: Table #15:  Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2001
Contact:  Allen Beck or Paige Harrison
Table 15.  Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2001

Note:  Based on custody counts from National Prisoner Statistics (NPS-1A) and updated from jurisdiction counts by gender at yearend.  Estimates by age derived from the Survey of Inmates in State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 1997.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, and other Pacific Islanders.
